title: Idle Airport CEO
description: Step into the shoes of a savvy CEO and take control of your very own airport! As you progress, collect passengers and upgrade your capabilities to increase plane capacity, speed, and efficiency. Optimize check-in times, revenue streams, and airline services to keep your customers happy and coming back for more. Oh, and did we mention that your money is piling up as we speak? Go offline, return and claim profits.
instructions: Manage your own airport, win passengers and earn massive profits in this business idle game.

title: Liquids Sort Puzzle
description: Colorful, bubbling, fragrant, and iridescent concoctions fill flasks, jugs, and test tubes in varying proportions! Figure out strategy and create harmony by collecting liquids of different colors and properties in different containers! Test your attention and reasoning skills in this meditative puzzle game. Many levels of increasing difficulty and bonus tasks await you! Excellent attention training and good mood guaranteed!
instructions: The controls are quite simple: click or tap on the flask and pour the liquid into another flask. Be careful, you can only pour liquid into a flask if the top layer in the second container is of the same color and there is enough space left. Stuck? You can undo your last action, add another empty container, or restart the level. Look for the hint!

title: MineTap Merge Clicker
description: MineTap is an idle clicker with merge mechanics and crafting. Also there is an adventure, where you can fight zombies and other monsters and even build your own village! Enjoy mining and treasure hunting. Complete quests and level up your character. Craft your ultimate weapon and slay epic monsters! Have you ever had a dream to be a hero and save the world? Then tap to play and become a legend of crafting. Start your epic mining adventure right now - click, tap & rock!
instructions: Tap buttons, open additional interface windows and drag objects on the playing field with the left mouse button. Combine blocks of resources and open new ones. Create equipment and weapons to fight monsters. Restore the destroyed village for even more benefits!

title: Hidden Kitty
description: Hidden Kitty is an engaging and delightful hidden object game for kids, available for free! Step into a world of adventure as you help an old lady reunite with her beloved kitties, who are playfully hiding throughout the building. Embark on a Kitty-Finding Adventure
instructions: Use mouse to play.

title: Cashier Game
description: You play as a cashier who needs to punch the goods and give change to the customers. As you earn money, you can improve your store and buy new furnishings.
instructions: Click on the bills to take them from the customer, drag the bills across the cash register trays to change the money and drag the money for change.

title: Muki Wizard
description: Muki Wizard is an arcade game where you face different enemies and bosses on different maps. collect money and improve your equipment or choose the best skills for your battles. Features: 150+ Levels to play. 30 Suits that improve your stats. 15 Weapons with different shots (some shoot faster). 8 Minibosses and 8 bosses. Increasing difficulty for each season. Easy to play ideal for your free time. :D
instructions: Hold the left mouse button to aim and release to shoot. Starting at level 5, you can move the tower with the left mouse button.

title: My Parking Lot
description: Welcome to "My Parking Lot," the ultimate puzzle challenge! Navigate through a chaotic mess of cars stuck in a parking lot and strategize to safely remove each vehicle without crashing them into each other. Your goal? Clear the parking lot by guiding all the cars to the exit, unlocking new levels as you master the art of precision parking. Can you untangle the traffic and solve each puzzle with finesse? Test your skills in "My Parking Lot" now!
instructions: Left Mouse click and drag map, Mid Mouse zoom
developer: Guangzhou Yomitoo Network Technology Co., Ltd.

title: Mirrors - Puzzle
description: Challenge your mind with Mirrors - Puzzle! In this captivating HTML5 puzzle game, your goal is to connect light dots by reflecting beams of light using mirrors. Strategically place and rotate mirrors to guide the light across the board, linking the dots to complete each level. As you progress, the puzzles become more complex, requiring careful planning and problem-solving skills. With its minimalist design and engaging gameplay, Mirrors - Puzzle offers endless brain-teasing fun on any device.
instructions: 1. Move Mirrow line on TOP 2. Tap To Mirrow Line for Rotare 3. Tap To Play Button To Connect Portals

title: Ballpoint
description: Ballpoint is a fascinating Arkanoid game in which you have to shoot balls from a cannon and hit all the targets. Colorful backgrounds, varied levels, many variations of levels and bonuses. Try to pass all levels!
instructions: The blocks have their own property: - Blue - basic, just adds points. - Yellow - level goal, you must hit all the yellow blocks. - Green - cloning bonus of the ball. - Purple - bonus points. - Red - random event that adds variety to the passage. - Bombs - create a bomb that hits many blocks. To shoot, you need to change the angle of the cannon with the mouse or the touchpad. When you release it, it will shoot at the specified angle.

title: Tower Defense Dragon Merge
description: Experience Tower Defense: Dragon Merge, a thrilling clash of strategy and chaos for hours of unique gameplay. Spin for PowerUps in the in-game shop, expanding your arsenal as you level up to combat invaders. In the frenzy of the alien assault, mash the cannon button for more firepower. Reinforce castle walls and fortify defenses through upgrades for a fighting chance against the relentless onslaught. Face the challenge, strengthen your defenses, and enjoy an exciting blend of strategy and chaos!
instructions: HOW TO PLAY Tower Defense Dragon Merge 1. Create a formidable army to dominate the battlefield. 2. Earn and merge units for stronger troopers and increased might. 3. Transform dinosaurs into colossal predators for swift victories. 4. Learn strategic positioning for maximum damage and stay ahead in evolution. 5. Customize your army for any encounter, be it dino hunters or swarming velociraptors.

title: Push It 3D
description: Push It 3D is a casual online game of pushing boxes for free. The game adopts a 3D perspective, presenting a complicated puzzle-solving process for players. You need to push the boxes in the game to complete tasks, and only push them to the specified position can you go to the next level. The game has multiple levels for you to challenge. If you are interested, come and challenge it!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Build and Run
description: Experience the ultimate blend of running and building in our action-packed game! Navigate through exciting levels by constructing missing parts of the level while running at full speed. Master using horizontal builds, slopes, and ramps to keep moving forward and avoid dangerous traps.
instructions: Use the build button to complete the missing parts of the level

title: Super Sniper Missions
description: Are you ready to experience an exciting first-person shooter game, Super Sniper Missions gives you an addictive shooting experience. You travel through various cities as a sniper who upholds the city's justice. Your mission is to kill the criminals within a limited time while keeping the hostages safe. Unlock and collect M74, 98K, and other sniper rifles, join us Save the hostages, and become the army's top sniper!
instructions: Slide to aim, release to shoot

title: Rope King
description: The Rope King is a fun and casual competitive game. In the game, players will control the characters to perform various strange rope skipping challenges. The game is simple and easy to use, the theme is humorous and funny, the game style is exquisite and creative, and it is matched with various funny actions and cool and dynamic sound effects. You will definitely love it.
instructions: Tap Screen to jump

title: Family Tree Puzzle
description: Get ready to dig into the family history and piece together the puzzle! In Family Tree Puzzle, you’ll be presented with a set of clues that will challenge your problem-solving skills and test your ability to think critically. Using the given information, assemble the family tree by connecting the dots between relatives and ancestors.
instructions: Piece together the family tree based on given clues.

title: RobyBox - Space Station Warehouse
description: Your main task is to place boxes in their designated places to open doors and advance through the levels. Be on the alert! Aggressive bots will chase you. You can destroy them with a powerful arsenal including drill, disks, mines and rockets. Traps are scattered throughout the levels - use them to your advantage by luring the bots into dangerous areas. When you need a break from the intense gameplay, head to the warehouse where you can earn gold and solve Sokoban-style puzzles in peace.
instructions: To pass the level, complete the tasks in the level description and place the crates in the specified locations on the level. PC controls: WASD or arrows - player movement E - repair Left mouse button - move to the specified point Right mouse button or spacebar - use weapons Mouse wheel or keys 1,2,3,4,5 - weapon selection Mobile devices: Use the joystick to move Fire button to use weapons Icons on the right side for weapon selection and repair

title: Hide and Build a Bridge!
description: Welcome to the exciting world of "Hide and Build a Bridge"! In this exciting game your goal is to collect blocks on the level and build a bridge from them to the portal. But be careful! There are also other players in the level who are trying to reach the goal together with you, and a seeker who breaks bridges and catches runners.
instructions: Collect blocks on the level, build a bridge from them to the portal and don't get caught by the seeker! PC controls: use the W/A/S/D buttons to control your character. Control on mobile device: tap the screen and use the joystick to control the character.

title: Bricks Breaker. Gravity Balls
description: Use gravity to smash all the blocks on the level with balls! This addictive puzzle game based on realistic physics will test your aiming skills. Get ready to embark on a journey through the world of bouncing balls and breaking bricks!
instructions: To aim, swipe your finger / mouse across the screen and choose the right angle to launch the balls. You need to destroy all the blocks on the playing field by hitting them with balls. The balls will bounce off walls and bricks, so aim carefully to destroy as many blocks as possible with each ball launch. Keep the balls in the game: if the balls fall to the bottom of the screen, all the blocks of bricks will move up, if at least one brick reaches the top, then you will lose.

title: Gun Craft Run Weapon Fire
description: Gun Craft Run Weapon Fire is an adrenaline-pumping endless running game that combines the thrill of shooting with the excitement of parkour. You must swiftly collect bullets and ammo packs to keep your gun firing. The obstacles are everywhere, but with quick reflexes and precise aiming, you can dodge them all. With its fast-paced gameplay, stunning visuals, and addictive soundtrack, Gun Craft Run Weapon Fire will keep you on the edge of your seat for hours on end.
instructions: Slide to move

title: Puzzle - LINES AND KNOTS 1
description: Easy to understand mechanics, swap hexagons with lines. The goal of the player is to assemble a puzzle consisting of nodes. ▪ 150 Levels ▪ Achievements
instructions: Easy to understand mechanics, swap hexagons with lines.

title: Save The Beauty
description: Save The Beauty is a free online adventure game for kids, which with rich levels, 2D perspective, fresh style, cartoon skin, and a random combination of level challenges that will surely open your eyes. Different levels have different traps, do not let the little sister hurt, or you will have to start all over again. Interested friends come to experience it!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Bowling Stars
description: Enjoy a classic game of bowling with simple and fun gameplay. Earning trophies will unlock better bowling balls and help you win against more skilled opponents.
instructions: Classic bowling rules apply. Swipe across the screen to set the trajectory and curve to the ball you throw. Defeat your opponents and upgrade your bowling balls.

title: Golf Orbit
description: One shot golf simulator is the battle of golf rivals to become the golf king worldwide. Become part of this idle golf orbit rocket league in which balls go high to Mars. Smash the ball to mars and become the golf champions. Oneshot Golf Orbit is golf offline game which has many golf rocket leagues and one shot golf battles. Be part Mars golf games to become champions of golfing over it.
instructions: The key to Golf Orbit is to aim and hit the golf ball as far as possible. This one-button game has relatively easy gameplay, but getting that perfect shot can be challenging. Tap your left mouse at the right time to set the power and hit the ball. As the ball soars, it bounces off various objects, gaining extra distance. Your distance will be recorded with each shot, keeping you accountable for your progress. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing.

title: Stop The Bullet
description: Your task is to create protective barriers by drawing illustrations on the screen that are able to repel enemy attacks. Each level provides you with new creative opportunities, your every stroke matters, and your artistic intuition will be the key to a successful defense!
instructions: Draw a bullet protection before the stickman gets shot! Caution! The bullet bounces off the surface and can fly straight into the stickman's face! But it can also bounce into the killer himself!

title: Antistress - Simulator Of Sequins DIY
description: ASMR sequin simulator game offers a realistic stress relief experience. Immerse yourself in the world of sequins, where every touch feels real and sensory. The antistress simulator will allow you to relax while enjoying the visual and tactile effects.
instructions: Choose a picture, pattern or drawing and start the game! Swipe your finger over the sequins and you will see how the pattern changes! Swipe your finger across the screen as if they were real sequin sequins!

title: CarJamcolor
description: There was a long queue of passengers at the public station platform with a "car jam" in the parking lot! what to do? Now it's time for the cars to transport passengers, you need to move them...but wait! You need to do it in the right order. Because other cars in the parking lot that become an obstacle! Can you solve this tricky parking puzzle and get all the cars on the road? what are you waiting for? Challenge your brain with this tricky game now!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Doomsday Zombie TD
description: Doomsday Zombie TD is a cool and exciting tower defense game. You aim to defend your castle from brutal enemy attacks and take down the zombie army. Depending on your defense strategy, you can upgrade your buildings, towers, arsenal, and army. Lead your army to defend the castle and kill the zombie hordes. Enjoy!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Phone Case DIY Run
description: Phone Case DIY Run is a very fun simulation game. What type of phone case do you have now? If you are interested in making a phone case, then come and join us to learn about the process! Collect the models, choose your favorite color for painting, then paste the picture and choose the pendant. Finally, the more phone cases you collect when you reach the end, the more money you get. Have fun!
instructions: Mouse click and drag to move

title: Love Archer
description: Welcome to "Love Archer" - an addictive game where you, as the cheerful Cupid, use your archery skills to bring together all the lovers! Solve puzzles, throw arrows at creatures, and they will find themselves in a magical garden, possessed by love. Are you ready, little hero? Shoot arrows of love to create different loving couples. Even an orc and a human can become happy parents. Combine them and watch love win!
instructions: The goal of the game is to use archer skills and magical arrows of love to connect different creatures, creating loving couples. The player solves puzzles by shooting arrows at the creatures, after which they find themselves in a magical garden, immersed in an atmosphere of love. The main task is to unite the hearts of different creatures, watching them become happy lovers and even parents. Controls: swipe / left mouse button.

title: PopCats: Merge the cats!
description: An incredibly cute game full of purring and cats. You have to connect identical cats to get bigger and bigger fuzzies. Each of them has its own story! Get to know them and connect the two biggest ones to win! Earn points and become the best cat on the leaderboard!
instructions: Connect identical seals into larger seals by clicking on the screen with your finger or mouse. To get to know a cat and find out its history, click on its image in the bottom panel. Make sure that the cats do not reach the top line, otherwise the game will end! You can change the next cat for watching ads. Use yarn to remove the interfering cat, and remember - the main thing here is not to miss! Collect points to take a leading position in the player rankings.

title: Star Attack 3D
description: Star Attack 3D is a thrilling arcade game that masterfully combines classic scrolling shooter gameplay with 3D graphics and modern mechanics. Take control of a powerful spaceship, engage in intense battles to destroy alien blocks, upgrade your ship with advanced features, and conquer a series of challenging levels. Whether you’re a fan of retro shooters or looking for a fresh arcade experience, Star Attack 3D offers endless action and excitement.
instructions: Controls: Use your finger, mouse, or keyboard to control your spaceship. Move it left or right to dodge obstacles and attack enemies. Attack: Your spaceship automatically fires at alien blocks. Focus on destroying blocks with lower numbers, as they require fewer shots. Upgrades: At each level, you can choose upgrades for your spaceship. Choose wisely to increase your chances of success in the upcoming levels.

title: Ladder Master - Color Run
description: Run and collect ladder parts, grow your ladder, reach the moon! Fun and addictive runner game for one player! Can you make the highest ladder? Check out now!
instructions: Move player with your mouse or your finger. Avoid obstacles. Collect ladders in your colour. Reach the pot of gold!

title: Save Baby Capybaras - Pull Pin
description: “Save Baby Capybaras - Pull Pin” is a cute puzzle game where you must figure out which pins to pull in order to rescue the baby capybaras and bring them to their father capybara. Be strategic, as some pins don’t need to be pulled, while others can disrupt your game. Unlock character skins using the rubies you earn and challenge yourself across various levels! Enjoy the game and raise your name on the global leaderboard!
instructions: Tap the pins to pull them. Tap the Capybara to move him. Acids damage capybara and pins, except small capybaras. Enter the portal to teleport to another location. The timed pin will break when it expires. The Hazmat suit offers acid protection.

title: Force Master 3D
description: Force Master 3D is a battle Math online game for boys for free. In the game, all the enemies are waiting for you at each level. You need to give priority to attacking monsters lower than yourself. The more monsters you attack, the higher your level will be. Be sure to pay attention to your own strength, because only in this way can you not be destroyed by the enemy!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Click Click Clicker
description: Click Click Clicker is a single-player, idle clicker game where you earn money by clicking the button on the screen. Unlock various buttons, cursor styles, themes, and music.
instructions: Click Click Clicker is as true to the clicker genre as it gets. You’re clicking a button to click another button. Click the button, upgrade your abilities, and get shiny new buttons for your hard work. Like many clicker games, you start with one humble click. With each click, you generate cash to buy upgrades. Those upgrades include an increase in your passive ability to earn money, the amount of cash you earn per click, or the number of cursors you have.

title: From Nerd To School Popular
description: Embark on a transformation journey “From Nerd To School Popular”! Help our protagonist navigate high school life, overcome challenges, and discover their true potential. With your guidance, they’ll undergo a stylish makeover, gain confidence, and rise to the top of the social ladder. Experience the ultimate high school makeover story and watch as our hero transforms from a shy outsider to a beloved school icon!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click or Tap to Play

title: OMG Word Sushi
description: Swipe to connect letters and form words in this sushi-themed word puzzle game. Challenge your vocabulary with over 81 levels and a minimalist cartoon style. Perfect for trivia and quiz enthusiasts. Think it's easy? Try the advanced levels!
instructions: Swipe to connect letters and form words in this sushi-themed puzzle game with over 81 challenging levels.

title: Magic Kingdom. Hex Match
description: Magic Kingdom: Hex Match is a game where you are the third son of a great king, sent to a distant land to prove your worth. Collect six vital resources—food, water, stone, wood, workers, and metal—to construct new buildings. Unlock all structures and create a stunning, magical kingdom!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI Drag the left mouse button to place the hexes stack on the field to make the top tiles match

title: iColorcoin Sort Puzzle
description: icolorcoin a reflexes and strategy thinking game.,designed color sort game! This game so creativity and gameplay. this game like Ball Sort, Water Sort, and merge games is its incredibly straightforward gameplay. Your objective is to arrange chips of the same color together and merge them into larger numbers when a grid is filled, creating a challenging and addictively fun game, for all ages.
instructions: Tap to move, to merge, to deal

title: Piggy Clicker
description: Piggy Clicker is a classic Clicker game, where you get to have Piggy as your pet and trough clicking buy him toys and such
instructions: Click on Piggy Once you have enough pennies collected, buy Items from the menu.

title: Bomb Head Hot Potato
description: In the game "Bomb Head - Hot Potato" your goal is to stay alive and not die from the bomb in your hand. Drop bombs on your opponents to win! Immerse yourself in the exciting world of "Bomb Head - Hot Potato" and prove your survival skills and tactical thinking!
instructions: The goal of Bomb Head - Hot Potato is to stay alive and defeat your opponents by throwing bombs and avoiding their explosions.

title: Clean House: Clearing trash and dirt
description: Welcome to an exciting game world where everyone can enjoy the process of cleaning. The further you advance, the more garbage accumulates, and your vacuum cleaner faces a real challenge. But don't despair! Collect all the garbage and take it to the garbage truck, earning money that can be spent on improving your vacuum cleaner. Clean and declutter your homes to restore them to their original beauty!
instructions: To pass the level, clear the entire room of debris. PC controls: Use the W\A\S\ D buttons to control your character. Mobile device controls: Tap the screen and use the joystick to control your character.

title: Northern Lights - the secret of the forest
description: A new hit for fans of the Match 3 game genre! The Scientist Cat is already hiding items throughout the mysterious forest so you can enjoy finding things and earn as many emeralds as possible. The cat is happy to have new guests!
instructions: - Combine identical objects and get new achievements - Open up territories - Meet your favorite childhood characters in person - New adventures open every day

title: Spot&Differs
description: A new exciting game "Spot&Differs" for children and adults! Find differences between two pictures and train your brain and mindfulness. If you like to play logic games, join us!
instructions: Open the game and start passing levels - find the differences between the pictures. In each level, you need to find 5 or more differences within the time limit. Comfortable game control: find the differences with touches (tap) on the phone or tablet screen, use the mouse on the computer. If you can't advance or find differences, use hints!

title: Guess Word
description: Guess Word is a free online puzzle and word game for boys played on PuzzleGame. It's easy to play. You have six chances to guess words. The letter you guessed will change color to give you a hint. This tests your vocabulary. The game is simple and very suitable for players of all ages. Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop are playable! We have three modes for you. Challenge yourself!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play

title: Devs Simulator
description: Welcome to the world of high technology and business! In this exciting strategy game you will become the director of a thriving IT company. Your task is to find the best programmers, assemble a dream team and lead it to success!
instructions: The goal of the game is to develop and expand your IT company by managing its resources, hiring qualified employees, improving equipment and software, as well as attracting customers and earning profit. The player must strive for the growth and success of his company, achieving high results and becoming a leader in the technology industry.

title: Wooden bolts and nuts
description: As you play, you'll find tangled screws, nuts, bolts, plates, rings, ropes, and more. Find out how to solve the riddle. It's not just a game, it's a journey through the many fun nuts and bolts of the game.
instructions: The goal of the game is to unscrew bolts and transfer them to empty cells! Unscrew all the bolts from the planks so that they fall down. Then you will pass the level.

title: My Farm Empire
description: My Farm Empire is a fun and relaxing game that lets you create your own farm paradise on a beautiful island. You will become a farmer and grow various crops, from fruits and vegetables to flowers and herbs. You will also enjoy the stunning graphics, the smooth gameplay, and the rewarding progression system that will make you feel like a real farmer. My Farm Empire is more than just a game, it’s a lifestyle. Join the My Farm Empire today and start your farming adventure.
instructions: Drag and swipe = move

title: Ball Tower of Hell
description: Ball in hell rolling his way to the top of the tower. There are many difficulties on the way, but the brave ball not scared
instructions: wasd + mouse

title: Candy Color Sort Puzzle
description: Welcome to our addictive and fun ball sort color puzzle game! If you're looking for a game that challenges your brain and keeps you entertained for hours, you've come to the right place. You'll never get bored. Our game is perfect for those who enjoy brain teasers, puzzles, and games that challenge their cognitive skills.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play
